Player History
Earned first career win on 4/28/1965...
Had first career hit on 7/13/1965, off Earl Wilson (BOS)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1966, winning 2 games with a 0.52 ERA...
Injured on 5/24/1967 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 6/28/1972 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1973, going 4-1, 1.38...
Injured on 4/2/1975 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 4 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1976, going 5-1, 2.50...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/13/1978 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
